name: Vampocalypse
description:
Welcome to the Vampocalypse!

You are one of the unlucky vampires forced to participate
in human kind's most popular and brutal competition on TV.
But don't worry, there is still hope for you, if you can run faster than the sun.

Tonight's show is a very special one with many surprises planned,
It is rumored that even the announcer himself may make an appearance!

Everything in the game was made by me with the exception of the music,
Which was taken from Kevin MacLeod at incompetech

If you enjoyed the game, consider following me on itch to get updates on my next ones :)
